price: Kuma Muka sanyã muku, a cikinta, abũbuwan rãyuwã* da wanda ba ku zamã mãsu ciyarwa gare shi ba.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
footnotes: * Muka sanya muku abũbuwan rãyuwa a cikinta, kuma Muka mallaka muku bãyi waɗanda suke bã kũ ne kuke ciyar da su ba, Mũ ne ke ciyar da su game da ku duka. Wãtau aza abũbuwa a kan ma'auni shĩ ne maslaha rashin yarda da tsaron ma'aunin nan shĩ ne izgili.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha waman lastum lahu birāziqīna
